# O
CycloneIdai O
Safety O
Tips O
3 O
. O
Just O
15 O
cm O
of O
moving O
water O
can O
knock O
you O
off O
your O
feet O
, O
while O
60 O
cm O
deep O
can O
sweep O
a O
vehicle O
away O
. O
Generally O
, O
if O
the O
water O
is O
deeper O
than O
the O
bottom O
of O
your O
doors O
or O
the O
bottom O
third O
of O
your O
wheels O
, O
it O
is O
not O
advisable O
to O
drive O
through O
it O
; O

Disaster O
preparedness O
is O
a O
key O
governance O
indicator O
which O
is O
often O
overlooked O
. O

affected O
by O

have O

& O

When O
floodwaters O
enter O
a O
home O
, O
almost O
everything O
below O
the O
water O
line O
has O
to O
be O
removed O
including O
drywall O
, O
flooring O
, O
and O
insulation O
. O
Otherwise O
, O
mold O
will O
begin O
to O
grow O
and O
spread O
. O
Operation O
Blessing O
volunteers O
are O
helping O
# O
Nebraska U-STAT
flood O
victims O
with O
this O
laborious O
process O
. O

nt O

, O

is O

Iowa U-STAT
and O

. O

how O

. O
